title: Cedar Smoked Barbecue Salmon
ingredients: ['2 (30cm) untreated cedar planks', '4 tablespoons pineapple juice', '5 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '175ml honey', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/4 teaspoon garlic granules', '6 (175g) skinless, boneless salmon fillets', 'salt and pepper to taste']
